dataList.title: The Pinky
dataList.content: Every six days, you will be subject to "midterms", prepared by the board of directors—Jia Yuanchun.

dataList.title: The Pinky
dataList.content: A palanquin has been prepared to take you to the exam sites, and only by passing the tests may Jia Xichun retain her status as the Family Hierarch.

dataList.title: The Pinky
dataList.content: Oh, don't worry yourself overmuch, master Wei. You sound like you're at a funeral.

dataList.title: The Pinky
dataList.content: She will pass these tests with ease as long as she has been diligently taking her classes.

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: No, it's... I... I simply hope I can survive until she returns... cough...
It seemed that Wei's rather funereal voice wasn't just out of his concern for Xichun.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: ... Wei, are you sure you're okay?

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: I can't escape them, even in dreams... the unfinished bundles of paperwork... cascading over me like a storm, burying me...

dataList.title: The Pinky
dataList.content: Steel yourself, for that was no dream at all.

dataList.title: The Pinky
dataList.content: In fact, never have I once seen paperwork trained in the arts of airwalking until now...
<Looks like we're not the only ones going through the wringer...>
